post.body: I used to love Dutch TV; It's so much better than Belgian TV (in Wallonia), but ... now I think it's pretty mediocre.
Just saw that Lando clip... It made my day.
I want one! What model did you end up getting? I'm crossing my fingers to get the black 13" for my birthday.
Rhinatiol conquers all!
Now I have another reason to get a new computer: the G doesn't work on my keyboard anymore ... and I'm starting to lose the Y.
I'm going to make some lunch and then watch some of the Office (US) that I got on DVD for Christmas! ( ^^)
I spent a great Christmas with the family yesterday. But, this morning I woke up to find that they all went to Ikea without me. Not cool.
Finished the second season of How I Met Your Mother. Totally diggin' the series so far.
Just got the first of the grades back. I got a 7 on the art review on the van Buuren museum & gardens! =]
I can't believe X-mas is right around the corner... It's recently come to my attention that I am the absolute worst at wrapping gifts.
Sent in the last take-home assignment! Now it's time for some maxxin' relaxxin' ... !
Time to read up on convergence culture & the Digital Stad Amsterdam for the second question of this take-home exam. We're getting there.
Plans to wake up in the morning never work out. But I'm almost done with the first of four take-home questions! ( ^^) ...
I'm going to bed. I'll wake up at 8 tomorrow morning to see what I can do with the take-home assignments. I can't wait to be done... ⌐⌐
Decided to take this evening off and not work on the Digital Media take-home assignment. I was so K.O. after the art exam.
It feels like a Ne-Yo weekend on TMF. This is the 4th time in an hour that they've shown one of his music videos (Oo);
I'm glad I finished the Kingdom last night {without people being overly critical about it}. I really enjoyed the movie!
I'm rewatching the Kingdom. Last time I saw this was with a group of people who were nothing but negative about the film from the get-go.
I'm watching Letters From Iwo Jima. I'm only about twenty minutes into the movie but so far, so good.
I'm going to bed.
